firep4j.tools
Class Versioner

java.lang.Object
  firep4j.tools.Versioner

class Versioner

This class provides static methods for comparing different version strings.

Constructor Detail

Versioner

Versioner()

 
Method Detail

compareVersions

private static int compareVersions(String version1, String version2)
This method compares to version strings. It works similar to the PHP version_compare function.
see:
http://php.net/manual/de/function.version-compare.php
param:
version1 Version string 1
param:
version2 Version string 2
return:
1 if version 1 is newer than version 2, -1 if version2 is newer, 0 if they have the same version number

mapVersionEntry

private static int mapVersionEntry(String entry)
This method maps one version string entry (separated by dots) to an integer value. Priorities (strings are case-sensitive): 0: String value "pl" 1: Any number 2: String "RC" for release candidate 3: String "beta" or "b" for beta test version 4: String "alpha" or "a" for alpha test version 5: String "dev" for development version 6: Any other string value
see:
http://php.net/manual/de/function.version-compare.php
param:
entry Version string entry
return:
The integer representation of the version string entry

standardizeVersion

private static String standardizeVersion(String version)
This method standardizes a version string.
- All occurences of "-", "+", "_" and " " are transformed into dots
- Before and after each alpha string value, dots are inserted if there are none (so version 4.2RC1 becomes 4.2.RC.1)
- All occurences of ".." are replaced with ".0."
- Occurences of "." at the beginning or the end of the string are replaced with "0." or ".0"
- All characters other than alphanumeric characters and dots are removed
see:
http://php.net/manual/de/function.version-compare.php
param:
version Version string
return:
Standardized version string
